	<script type="text/javascript">
	function OptanonWrapper() {
		var handler = document.getElementById('confirm-choices-handler');

		if (handler) {
			handler.addEventListener("click", function() {Optanon.RejectAll(); alert("You have been opted out of browser data sharing by this site. This setting will not apply to other sites, your other browsers or if you clean this browser's cookies");}); }
		}

					<!--Google tag(gtag . js)-->
			<script async src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=G-0DZ7LHF5PZ"  type="text/plain"  class="optanon-category-C0024"></script> 				<script type="text/javascript">
			window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
			function gtag()
			{
				dataLayer.push(arguments);
			}
			gtag('js', new Date());
						gtag('config', 'G-0DZ7LHF5PZ', {
			  send_page_view: false,
			});
					</script>
				<script type="text/javascript">
		  window.ga4Dims = window.ga4Dims || {};

		  const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
		  const isGA4DebugMode = urlParams.has('debug');

		  const targetKeys = [
			'zephr_tracking_id',
			'ga_aut_id',
			'aqfer_puu',
		  ];

		  const intervalTime = 250;
		  const maxWaitTime = 2000;

		  function checkForRequiredDim() {
			const foundKey = targetKeys.find(key => window.ga4Dims.hasOwnProperty(key) && window.ga4Dims[key] !== null);

			if (foundKey !== undefined) {
			  gtag('event', 'page_view', window.ga4Dims);
			  clearInterval(intervalId);

			  if (isGA4DebugMode) {
				console.log(`At least one key found with a non-null value: ${foundKey}. Sending the page_view.`);
			  }
			} else {
			  const elapsedTime = Date.now() - startTime;
			  if (isGA4DebugMode) {
				console.log(`None of the keys found with a non-null value. Elapsed time: ${elapsedTime} ms`);
			  }

			  if (elapsedTime >= maxWaitTime) {
				gtag('event', 'page_view', window.ga4Dims);
				clearInterval(intervalId);
				if (isGA4DebugMode) {
				  console.log(`Maximum wait time exceeded. Stopping the search and send the page_view.`);
				}
			  }
			}
		  }

		  const startTime = Date.now();
		  const intervalId = setInterval(checkForRequiredDim, intervalTime);

		</script>
					<script type="text/javascript">
			window.nypGa = function(callback) {
				if ('function' === typeof window.ga) {
					window.ga((tracker) => {
						callback(tracker);
					});
				} else {
					window.addEventListener('ga:loaded', function() {
						window.ga((tracker) => {
							callback(tracker);
						});
					});
				}
			};
		</script>

		<!-- Google Analytics command queue start -->
		<script  type="text/plain"  class="optanon-category-C0024">
			(function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
			(i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
			m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
			})(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

			(function() {

				// Set the default options for the Google Analytics "create" function.
				var gaCreateOptions = {
					trackingId: "UA-3922003-6",
					cookieDomain: 'auto',
					useAmpClientId: true
				};

				// Add the allowLinker option if it is configured and found in PHP.
									gaCreateOptions.allowLinker = true;
					
				var isLsAvailable = function() {
					var test = 'test';
					try {
						window.localStorage.setItem(test, test);
						window.localStorage.removeItem(test);
						return true;
					} catch (e) {
						return false;
					}
				}

				// Bail early and use the old method if we do not have localStorage in this browser.
				if ( ! isLsAvailable() ) {
					ga( 'create', gaCreateOptions );
					return;
				}

				// If we have a GA clientId in the URL.
				var haveClientIdInURL = false;

				// First, check for linker param in URL and let GA use that for our clientId if it exists.
				// Check if URLSearchParams is available, otherwise use a polyfill function.
				if ( 'function' === typeof URLSearchParams ) {
					var urlParams = new URLSearchParams( window.location.search );
					if ( urlParams.get( '_ga' ) ) {
						haveClientIdInURL = true;
					}
				} else {
					/**
					 * A polyfill for older browsers like IE.
					 * @link https://caniuse.com/#feat=urlsearchparams
					 * @link https://davidwalsh.name/query-string-javascript
					 */
					var getUrlParameter = function(name) {
						name = name.replace( /[\[]/, '\\[' ).replace( /[\]]/, '\\]' );
						var regex = new RegExp('[\\?&]' + name + '=([^&#]*)');
						var results = regex.exec( location.search );
						return results === null ? false : decodeURIComponent( results[1].replace( /\+/g, ' ' ) );
					};
					if ( getUrlParameter( '_ga' ) ) {
						haveClientIdInURL = true;
					}
				}

				// Assume the GA Cookie is not present.
				var hasGACookie = false;

				// Try to get the GA Cookie.
				var GACookie = document.cookie.split(';').filter(function(item) {
					return item.trim().indexOf('_ga=') === 0
				} );

				// Check if we have a cookie.
				if ( GACookie.length ) {
					// If the cookie value is not empty we have a GA cookie.
					hasGACookie = GACookie[0].trim().length > 4 ? true : false;
				}

				// Id to use for localStorage object which holds the GA clientId and expire time.
				var gaClientIdLocalStorageId = 'nyp_ga_client_id';

				// If we don't have a clientId in the URL and there is no GA cookie set, we look in localStorage for one.
				if ( ! haveClientIdInURL && ! hasGACookie ) {

					// If no linker param and no GA cookie, we check in localStorage for the GA clientId.
					var nypGALocalStorage = window.localStorage.getItem( gaClientIdLocalStorageId ) || '{}';
					var parsedNYPGALocalStorage = JSON.parse( nypGALocalStorage );
					var now = new Date().getTime();
					if ( parsedNYPGALocalStorage.clientId && parsedNYPGALocalStorage.expires ) {
						if ( now <= parsedNYPGALocalStorage.expires ) {

							// If we have the clientId, add it to the GA Tracker options.
							if ( parsedNYPGALocalStorage.clientId && '' !== parsedNYPGALocalStorage.clientId ) {
								gaCreateOptions.clientId = parsedNYPGALocalStorage.clientId;
							}
						}
					}
				}

				// Create the tracker instance.
				ga( 'create', gaCreateOptions );

				// Add the clientId to localStorage using readyCallback to ensure the tracker instance has been instantiated.
				ga( function( tracker ) {
					var clientId = tracker.get( 'clientId' );
					if ( clientId ) {
						var gaClientIdStore = JSON.stringify({
							clientId: clientId,
							expires: new Date().getTime() + 1000*60*60*24*365*2
						});
						window.localStorage.setItem( gaClientIdLocalStorageId, gaClientIdStore );
					}

					// Set the client ID as a dimension for tracking against with Aqfer.
					ga( 'set', 'dimension88', clientId );
					window.ga4Dims = window.ga4Dims || {};
					window.ga4Dims.aqfer_puu = clientId;
				});

				if ('function' === typeof CustomEvent) {
					window.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('ga:loaded'));
				}
			})();

			ga('require', 'linker');
ga('linker:autoLink', ["nypost.com","pagesix.com","decider.com"])

			// Optimizely Universal Analytics Integration code
			window.optimizely = window.optimizely || [];
			window.optimizely.push(['activateUniversalAnalytics']);
		</script>
		<!-- Google Analytics command queue end -->
				<script type="text/javascript">
			window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
			dataLayer.push(
			{"page_type":"Home","section":"decider.com-home","pagename":"\/"}			 );
		</script>
					<script  type="text/plain"  class="optanon-category-C0023">
		  /* Start Amazon Publisher Services Library download code. */
		  // Load the APS JavaScript Library
		  !function(a9,a,p,s,t,A,g){if(a[a9])return;function q(c,r){a[a9]._Q.push([c,r])}a[a9]={init:function(){q("i",arguments)},fetchBids:function(){q("f",arguments)},setDisplayBids:function(){},targetingKeys:function(){return[]},_Q:[]};A=p.createElement(s);A.async=!0;A.src=t;g=p.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];g.parentNode.insertBefore(A,g)}("apstag",window,document,"script","//c.amazon-adsystem.com/aax2/apstag.js");
		  /* End Amazon Publisher Services Library download code. */
		</script>

	if ( navigator.userAgent.match(/IEMobile\/10\.0/) ) {
		var msViewportStyle = document.createElement( 'style' );
		msViewportStyle.appendChild(
			document.createTextNode( '@-ms-viewport{ width:auto!important }' )
		);
		document.getElementsByTagName( 'head' )[0].appendChild( msViewportStyle );

	var mvp = document.getElementById('nypviewport'),
	slideshowVideo = 0;
	if ( screen.width <= 767 || ( slideshowVideo && screen.width < 1024 ) ) {
		mvp.setAttribute('content','width=device-width, initial-scale=1, viewport-fit=cover');
	}

			var nypost_is_ios = /iPad|iPhone|iPod/.test( navigator.userAgent );

		// Global vars based on window object
		window.wi = ( nypost_is_ios ) ? screen.width : window.innerWidth;
		window.hi = ( nypost_is_ios ) ? screen.height : window.innerHeight;

		function get_screen() {
			var nypost_width = ( nypost_is_ios ) ? screen.width : window.innerWidth;

			if ( nypost_width < 767 ) {
				return 'mobile';
			}

			return 'desktop';
		}

		window.nypost_screen = get_screen();
	</script>

auto;max-width:100%}.inline-slideshow__header{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;margin-bottom:1.25rem;position:relative;text-align:center}.inline-slideshow__header:before{background:var(--wp--preset--color--black);content:"";display:block;height:.0625rem;left:0;margin:0 2.8125rem;position:absolute;right:0;top:50%}@media(min-width:37.5rem){.inline-slideshow__header:before{margin:0 3.4375rem}}.inline-slideshow__image{display:block;margin-bottom:.625rem;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;position:relative}.inline-slideshow__nav{background-color:transparent;border:0;border-radius:0;cursor:pointer;display:block;height:2.1875rem;line-height:1!important;padding:0;width:2.1875rem}@media(min-width:48rem){.inline-slideshow__nav{height:3.125rem;width:3.125rem}}.inline-slideshow__nav--prev{transform:rotate(180deg)}.inline-slideshow__nav 		<div class="nav-panel nav-panel--stories nav-panel--shows" data-panel-name="shows" data-panel-type="stories" aria-label="shows">
							<section class="nav-panel__content">
					<div class="nav-panel__control__wrapper">
						<h4 class="nav-panel__heading"><span>Decider Picks</span></h4>

		<div id="div-gpt-ad-skin" class="dfp-ad dfp-ad-decider dfp-skin" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
			<div class="ad-wrapper">
		<script  type="text/plain"  class="optanon-category-C0023">
			var adWrapper = document.querySelector('.gallery-ad__wrapper');
			if (typeof googletag !== 'undefined') {
				googletag.cmd.push(function() {
					if (window.definedSlots && -1 !== window.definedSlots.indexOf("div-gpt-ad-skin")) {
						googletag.display("div-gpt-ad-skin");
					} else {
						console.log('div-gpt-ad-skin not a defined slot', window.definedSlots || []);
					}
				});
			}
		</script>
	</div>
	</div>	<div id="div-gpt-ad-overlay_fullpage" class="dfp-ad dfp-ad-decider dfp-overlay_fullpage" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
			<div class="ad-wrapper">
		<script  type="text/plain"  class="optanon-category-C0023">
			var adWrapper = document.querySelector('.gallery-ad__wrapper');
			if (typeof googletag !== 'undefined') {
				googletag.cmd.push(function() {
					if (window.definedSlots && -1 !== window.definedSlots.indexOf("div-gpt-ad-overlay_fullpage")) {
						googletag.display("div-gpt-ad-overlay_fullpage");
					} else {
						console.log('div-gpt-ad-overlay_fullpage not a defined slot', window.definedSlots || []);
					}
				});
			}
		</script>
	</div>
	</div>
	<main id="content">
			<div class="ie-notice" style="display:none" aria-hidden="true"></div>
											<div id="header-billboard-ad" class="billboard-ad" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1" data-ad-target=billb_atf_below_header>
					
<div class="ad ad--container d-none d-block-lg">
	<div class="ad__wrapper">
				<div class="ad__placeholder ad__placeholder--content-visibility ad__placeholder--skeleton ad__placeholder--banner">
			<div class="ad-slot skeleton skeleton--ad skeleton--div-gpt-ad-billb_atf">
		<div id="div-gpt-ad-billb_atf" class="dfp-ad dfp-div-gpt-ad-billb_atf dfp-ad-decider" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
			<div id="div-gpt-ad-billb_atf" class="dfp-ad dfp-ad-decider dfp-billb_atf" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
			<div class="ad-wrapper">
		<script  type="text/plain"  class="optanon-category-C0023">
			var adWrapper = document.querySelector('.gallery-ad__wrapper');

		<h3 class="story__heading story__heading--primary">
			<a href="https://decider.com/2024/05/03/new-shows-movies-to-watch-this-weekend-unfrosted-on-netflix-more/"
				class="postid-1694697"
											>
				New Shows &amp; Movies To Watch This Weekend: 'Unfrosted' on Netflix + More			</a>
		</h3>

					<div class="story__meta">
							<time class="story__meta__time" datetime="2024-05-03T08:00:00+00:00">
			May 3, 2024, 8:00 a.m. ET		</time>
					</div>
			</div>
			<p class="top-stories__story-excerpt">
			...plus a new season of <em>Hacks</em> on Max, the premiere of <em>The Tattooist of Auschwitz</em> on Peacock, and so much more.		</p>
	</section>

100vw, 322px" />		</a>
	</div>
	<div class="story__header">
					
		
		
		<h3 class="story__heading ">
			<a href="https://decider.com/2024/05/02/unfrosted-review-jerry-seinfeld-pop-tart-movie-netflix/"
				class="postid-1704502"
											>
				Jerry Seinfelds Pop-Tarts Movie Unfrosted Is Unhinged In All the Wrong Ways			</a>
		</h3>

					<div class="story__meta">
							<time class="story__meta__time" datetime="2024-05-02T22:00:00+00:00">
			May 2, 2024, 10:00 p.m. ET		</time>
					</div>
			</div>
	</section>
</section>

			<div class="box show-mobile module nypost_dfp_ad_rec_atf_widget widget_nypost_dfp_ad_widget">

															</a>
							<section class="carousel__card-content">
								<a class="carousel__card-heading" href="https://decider.com/what-to-watch/talking-sabor/">
									'Talking Sabor'								</a>
								<p class="carousel__card-description">
									Chef Aarn Snchez spotlights and celebrates sixteen Latino-owned restaurants in this new limited-edition series on Hulu.									<a class="wtw-card-content__more" href="https://decider.com/what-to-watch/talking-sabor/"><svg width="13" height="10" viewBox="0 0 52 41"><title>Learn More</title><path d="M.33 0c3.05 2.72 25.42 20.83 25.42 20.83L0 40.62s2-8.08 9.68-20.1c0 0-6.15-7.58-9.35-20.52zm26 0c3.05 2.72 25.42 20.83 25.42 20.83L26 40.62s2-8.08 9.68-20.1c0 0-6.15-7.58-9.35-20.52z" fill-rule="evenodd"/></svg></a>
								</p>
							</section>
						</li>
											<li class="glide__slide">
							<a href="https://decider.com/what-to-watch/thank-you-goodnight-the-bon-jovi-story/">
																	<img
									srcset="https://decider.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/bon-jovi_ba0ddd.jpg?quality=75&amp;strip=all&amp;w=171&amp;h=114&amp;crop=1 171w, https://decider.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/bon-jovi_ba0ddd.jpg?quality=75&amp;strip=all&amp;w=230&amp;h=152&amp;crop=1 230w, https://decider.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/bon-jovi_ba0ddd.jpg?quality=75&amp;strip=all&amp;w=460&amp;h=304&amp;crop=1 460w"
									sizes="(max-width: 977px) 33vw, 225px"
									src='data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 460 304"%3E%3C/svg%3E'
									alt="&#039;Thank You, Goodnight: The Bon Jovi Story&#039;"
									loading="lazy"
									 width="1284"  height="856" 									>
															</a>
							<section class="carousel__card-content">
								<a class="carousel__card-heading" href="https://decider.com/what-to-watch/thank-you-goodnight-the-bon-jovi-story/">
									'Thank You, Goodnight: The Bon Jovi Story'								</a>
								<p class="carousel__card-description">
									The Hulu docuseries is a heartfelt ode to Bon Jovi's decades of success.									<a class="wtw-card-content__more" href="https://decider.com/what-to-watch/thank-you-goodnight-the-bon-jovi-story/"><svg width="13" height="10" viewBox="0 0 52 41"><title>Learn More</title><path d="M.33 0c3.05 2.72 25.42 20.83 25.42 20.83L0 40.62s2-8.08 9.68-20.1c0 0-6.15-7.58-9.35-20.52zm26 0c3.05 2.72 25.42 20.83 25.42 20.83L26 40.62s2-8.08 9.68-20.1c0 0-6.15-7.58-9.35-20.52z" fill-rule="evenodd"/></svg></a>
								</p>
							</section>
						</li>
											<li class="glide__slide">
							<a href="https://decider.com/what-to-watch/sisters/">

									Dynamic duo Tina Fey and Amy Poehler go hard in their 2015 rager comedy.									<a class="wtw-card-content__more" href="https://decider.com/what-to-watch/sisters/"><svg width="13" height="10" viewBox="0 0 52 41"><title>Learn More</title><path d="M.33 0c3.05 2.72 25.42 20.83 25.42 20.83L0 40.62s2-8.08 9.68-20.1c0 0-6.15-7.58-9.35-20.52zm26 0c3.05 2.72 25.42 20.83 25.42 20.83L26 40.62s2-8.08 9.68-20.1c0 0-6.15-7.58-9.35-20.52z" fill-rule="evenodd"/></svg></a>

					<div class="entry-header">
						
	<a class="story__flag" href="https://decider.com/stream-it-or-skip-it/">Stream It Or Skip It</a>
						<h3 class="entry-heading">
							<a href="https://decider.com/2024/05/03/selling-the-oc-season-3-netflix-review/" class="postid-1704920"
																>
								Stream It Or Skip It: 'Selling The O.C.' Season 3 on Netflix Once Again Sells More Tyler and Alex Hall Relationship Drama Than It Does Real Estate</a>
						</h3>

												<div class="entry-meta">
																	<span class="story__meta__author">
		<span>By</span> Liz Kocan	</span>
	
	<span class="bullet">&bull;</span>

				<time class="story__meta__time" datetime="2024-05-03T10:30:00+00:00">
			May 3, 2024, 10:30 a.m. ET		</time>
		
	
														</div><!-- .entry-meta -->
					</div><!-- .entry-header -->

					<div class="entry-content">
						Season 3 of <em>Selling The O.C.</em> promises more luxury listings and dysfunctional relationships than ever!					</div><!-- .entry-content -->
				</li><!-- #post -->
			
		
			
			
			
			
				<li id="post-1703485" class="article half outline- the-latest__article article-loop__article outline-red post-1703485 type-article status-publish has-post-thumbnail tag-chloe-guidry tag-interviews tag-lily-gladstone tag-quinn-shephard tag-riley-keough tag-samir-mehta tag-true-crime tag-vritika-gupta section-queue-and-a show-under-the-bridge genre-drama platform-hulu platform-hulu-live-tv">
											<div class="entry-thumbnail">
							<a href="https://decider.com/2024/05/03/under-the-bridge-star-chloe-guidry-interview/" tabindex="-1"
																>

https://decider.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/interview-Chloe-Guidry.jpg?resize=285,190 285w, https://decider.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/interview-Chloe-Guidry.jpg?resize=645,430 645w, https://decider.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/interview-Chloe-Guidry.jpg?resize=1200,800 1200w, https://decider.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/interview-Chloe-Guidry.jpg?resize=320,213 320w, 													</div>
					
					<div class="entry-header">
						
	<a class="story__flag" href="https://decider.com/queue-and-a/">Queue And A</a>
						<h3 class="entry-heading">
							<a href="https://decider.com/2024/05/03/under-the-bridge-star-chloe-guidry-interview/" class="postid-1703485"
																>
								'Under the Bridge' Star Chloe Guidry Breaks Down Intense Family Dinner in Episode 4: "She Didn't Want To Feel Weak"</a>
						</h3>

												<div class="entry-meta">
																	<span class="story__meta__author">
		<span>By</span> Raven Brunner	</span>
	
	<span class="bullet">&bull;</span>

				<time class="story__meta__time" datetime="2024-05-03T10:00:00+00:00">
			May 3, 2024, 10:00 a.m. ET		</time>
		
	
														</div><!-- .entry-meta -->
					</div><!-- .entry-header -->

					<div class="entry-content">
						"Jo definitely saw Reena's love that her parents gave her and that belonging and the family she never had," Chloe Guidry told Decider.					</div><!-- .entry-content -->
				</li><!-- #post -->

								Nicholas Galitzine Is the King of Pretty Tears in Amazons Addicting Romance The Idea of You</a>

					</div><!-- .entry-header -->

					<div class="entry-content">
						Hate to see him sad, but love to watch him cry.					</div><!-- .entry-content -->
				</li><!-- #post -->
			
		
			
			
			
			
				<li id="post-1706602" class="article half outline- the-latest__article article-loop__article outline-red post-1706602 type-article status-publish has-post-thumbnail tag-donald-trump tag-jimmy-kimmel tag-news tag-politics tag-stormy-daniels show-jimmy-kimmel-live genre-documentary-reality platform-abc">

					<div class="entry-header">
						
						<h3 class="entry-heading">
							<a href="https://decider.com/2024/05/03/jimmy-kimmel-wants-testify-donald-trumps-trial/" class="postid-1706602"
																>
								Jimmy Kimmel Wants To Testify In Donald Trump's Trial: "I Need To Be In Court"</a>
						</h3>

												<div class="entry-meta">
																	<span class="story__meta__author">
		<span>By</span> Samantha Nungesser	</span>
	
	<span class="bullet">&bull;</span>

				<time class="story__meta__time" datetime="2024-05-03T09:26:55+00:00">
			May 3, 2024, 9:26 a.m. ET		</time>
		
	
														</div><!-- .entry-meta -->
					</div><!-- .entry-header -->

					<div class="entry-content">
						Kimmel was "excited" that his interview with Stormy Daniels was brought up in Trump's trial.					</div><!-- .entry-content -->
				</li><!-- #post -->
			
		
			
			
			
			
				<li id="post-1706316" class="article half outline- the-latest__article article-loop__article outline-red post-1706316 type-article status-publish has-post-thumbnail tag-aisha-hinds tag-angela-bassett tag-brad-falchuk tag-brian-hallisay tag-courtney-love tag-interviews tag-jennifer-love-hewitt tag-kenneth-choi tag-oliver-stark tag-peter-krause tag-ryan-guzman tag-ryan-murphy tag-tim-minear section-queue-and-a show-9-1-1 show-revenge show-the-inside genre-drama platform-abc platform-abc-via-cable-satellite-provider platform-hulu platform-hulu-live-tv">

					<div class="entry-header">
						
	<a class="story__flag" href="https://decider.com/queue-and-a/">Queue And A</a>
						<h3 class="entry-heading">
							<a href="https://decider.com/2024/05/03/911-brian-hallisay-interview-doug-kendall-jennifer-love-hewitt-husband/" class="postid-1706316"
																>
								'9-1-1's Brian Hallisay Dishes On Doug's Unexpected Return, Working With IRL Wife Jennifer Love Hewitt, And More</a>
						</h3>

												<div class="entry-meta">
																	<span class="story__meta__author">
		<span>By</span> Nicole Gallucci	</span>
	
	<span class="bullet">&bull;</span>

				<time class="story__meta__time" datetime="2024-05-03T09:00:00+00:00">
			May 3, 2024, 9:00 a.m. ET		</time>
		
	
														</div><!-- .entry-meta -->
					</div><!-- .entry-header -->

					<div class="entry-content">
						"I thought it was a super creative way to bring that character back," Hallisay told Decider.					</div><!-- .entry-content -->
				</li><!-- #post -->

					<div class="entry-header">
						
						<h3 class="entry-heading">
							<a href="https://decider.com/2024/05/03/the-fall-guy-ryan-gosling-emily-blunt-chemistry/" class="postid-1702698"

								In 'The Fall Guy,' Ryan Gosling and Emily Blunt Give a Perfect Chemistry Lesson</a>
						</h3>

												<div class="entry-meta">

	<span class="bullet">&bull;</span>

					</div><!-- .entry-header -->

					<div class="entry-content">
						The ability to generate chemistry with multiple co-stars should be considered a superpower.					</div><!-- .entry-content -->

	<a class="story__flag" href="https://decider.com/stream-it-or-skip-it/">Stream It Or Skip It</a>
						<h3 class="entry-heading">
							<a href="https://decider.com/2024/05/02/tp-bon-netflix-review/" class="postid-1706427"
																>
								Stream It Or Skip It: 'TP BON' on Netflix, A Delightful Update on the Classic Manga Series</a>
						</h3>

												<div class="entry-meta">
																	<span class="story__meta__author">
		<span>By</span> Brittany Vincent	</span>
	
	<span class="bullet">&bull;</span>

				<time class="story__meta__time" datetime="2024-05-02T21:30:00+00:00">
			May 2, 2024, 9:30 p.m. ET		</time>
		
	
														</div><!-- .entry-meta -->
					</div><!-- .entry-header -->

					<div class="entry-content">
						<em>TP BON</em> may look like a simple childrens show, but its much more nuanced than that.					</div><!-- .entry-content -->
				</li><!-- #post -->

							<a href="https://decider.com/2024/05/02/911-jennifer-love-hewitt-islands-in-the-stream-cover-spotify-madney-wedding-song/" class="postid-1706251"
																>
								'9-1-1' Releases Jennifer Love Hewitt's "Islands in the Stream" Cover In Honor Of Maddie And Chimney's Wedding</a>

	<span class="bullet">&bull;</span>

					<div class="entry-content">
						We're not crying, you're crying!					</div><!-- .entry-content -->
				</li><!-- #post -->
			
		
			
			
			
			
				<li id="post-1704344" class="article half outline- the-latest__article article-loop__article outline-red post-1704344 type-article status-publish has-post-thumbnail tag-british tag-british-comedy tag-british-shows tag-channel-4 tag-comedy tag-lolly-adefope tag-paul-rudd tag-sarah-solemani tag-sienna-miller tag-steve-coogan tag-tv-reviews tag-wanda-sykes tag-woke section-stream-it-or-skip-it show-chivalry show-extras show-reboot-2022 genre-comedy platform-the-network">
											<div class="entry-thumbnail">
							<a href="https://decider.com/2024/05/02/chivalry-the-network-review/" tabindex="-1"
																>
								<img width="300" height="200" src="https://decider.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/chivalry-1.jpg?quality=75&amp;strip=all&amp;w=300&amp;h=200&amp;crop=1" class="" alt="Chivalry" 													</div>
					
					<div class="entry-header">
						
	<a class="story__flag" href="https://decider.com/stream-it-or-skip-it/">Stream It Or Skip It</a>
						<h3 class="entry-heading">
							<a href="https://decider.com/2024/05/02/chivalry-the-network-review/" class="postid-1704344"
																>
								Stream It Or Skip It: 'Chivalry' On The Network, Where A Progressive Director And A Misogynistic Producer Butt Heads On A Film As They Grow Closer To Each Other</a>
						</h3>

												<div class="entry-meta">
																	<span class="story__meta__author">
		<span>By</span> Joel Keller	</span>
	
	<span class="bullet">&bull;</span>

				<time class="story__meta__time" datetime="2024-05-02T20:30:00+00:00">
			May 2, 2024, 8:30 p.m. ET		</time>
		
	
														</div><!-- .entry-meta -->
					</div><!-- .entry-header -->

					<div class="entry-content">
						Steve Coogan and Sarah Solemani write and star in the movie business satire. Wanda Sykes and Sienna Miller also star.					</div><!-- .entry-content -->
				</li><!-- #post -->

					<div class="entry-header">
						
	<a class="story__flag" href="https://decider.com/stream-it-or-skip-it/">Stream It Or Skip It</a>
						<h3 class="entry-heading">
							<a href="https://decider.com/2024/05/02/murder-in-season-12-mhz-choice-review/" class="postid-1702990"
																>
								Stream It Or Skip It: 'Murder In...' Season 12 On MHz Choice, Where Jason Priestley Guests In The Long-Running French Mystery Anthology Series</a>
						</h3>

												<div class="entry-meta">
																	<span class="story__meta__author">
		<span>By</span> Joel Keller	</span>
	
	<span class="bullet">&bull;</span>

				<time class="story__meta__time" datetime="2024-05-02T19:30:00+00:00">
			May 2, 2024, 7:30 p.m. ET		</time>
		
	
														</div><!-- .entry-meta -->
					</div><!-- .entry-header -->

					<div class="entry-content">
						Each episode of<em>Murder In...</em> takes place in a different part of France.					</div><!-- .entry-content -->
				</li><!-- #post -->

	<a class="story__flag" href="https://decider.com/stream-it-or-skip-it/">Stream It Or Skip It</a>

						A man was isolated and essentially psychologically tortured for entertainment.					</div><!-- .entry-content -->

						<h3 class="entry-heading">
							<a href="https://decider.com/2024/05/02/corey-feldman-vs-barbara-walters/" class="postid-1705881"
																>
								Corey Feldman "Never Got An Apology" From The Late Barbara Walters After She Accused Him of "Damaging An Entire Industry" By Discussing The Sexual Abuse He Suffered As A Child Actor</a>
						</h3>

												<div class="entry-meta">
																	<span class="story__meta__author">
		<span>By</span> Alex Vena	</span>
	
	<span class="bullet">&bull;</span>

				<time class="story__meta__time" datetime="2024-05-02T18:41:39+00:00">

														</div><!-- .entry-meta -->
					</div><!-- .entry-header -->

					<div class="entry-content">
						The moment took place on the ABC morning show in 2013.					</div><!-- .entry-content -->
				</li><!-- #post -->
			
		
			
			
			
			
				<li id="post-1705004" class="article half outline- the-latest__article article-loop__article outline-red post-1705004 type-article status-publish has-post-thumbnail tag-horror tag-jacob-batalon movie-tarot genre-documentary-reality platform-max platform-netflix">
											<div class="entry-thumbnail">
							<a href="https://decider.com/2024/05/02/is-tarot-streaming-on-netflix-or-hbo-max/" tabindex="-1"
																>

					<div class="entry-header">
						
						<h3 class="entry-heading">
							<a href="https://decider.com/2024/05/02/is-tarot-streaming-on-netflix-or-hbo-max/" class="postid-1705004"
																>
								Is 'Tarot' Streaming on Netflix or HBO Max?</a>
						</h3>

												<div class="entry-meta">
																	<span class="story__meta__author">
		<span>By</span> Samantha Nungesser	</span>
	
	<span class="bullet">&bull;</span>

				<time class="story__meta__time" datetime="2024-05-02T18:30:00+00:00">
			May 2, 2024, 6:30 p.m. ET		</time>
		
	
														</div><!-- .entry-meta -->
					</div><!-- .entry-header -->

					<div class="entry-content">
						A new horror movie is coming to the big screen.					</div><!-- .entry-content -->
				</li><!-- #post -->
			
		
			
			
			
			
				<li id="post-1704124" class="article half outline- the-latest__article article-loop__article outline-red post-1704124 type-article status-publish has-post-thumbnail tag-carl-clemons-hopkins tag-christopher-mcdonald tag-comedy tag-hannah-einbinder tag-helen-hunt tag-jean-smart tag-jen-statsky tag-just-for-laughs tag-lucia-aniello tag-megan-stalter tag-paul-w-downs tag-stand-up-comedy tag-tv-reviews section-stream-it-or-skip-it show-hacks show-insecure show-ted-lasso genre-comedy platform-max">

					<div class="entry-header">
						
	<a class="story__flag" href="https://decider.com/stream-it-or-skip-it/">Stream It Or Skip It</a>
						<h3 class="entry-heading">
							<a href="https://decider.com/2024/05/02/hacks-season-3-hbo-max-review/" class="postid-1704124"
																>
								Stream It Or Skip It: 'Hacks' Season 3 On Max, Where Deborah And Ava Try To Rebuild Their Friendship As Both Of Them Have A Lot Of Career Success</a>
						</h3>

												<div class="entry-meta">
																	<span class="story__meta__author">
		<span>By</span> Joel Keller	</span>
	
	<span class="bullet">&bull;</span>

				<time class="story__meta__time" datetime="2024-05-02T17:30:00+00:00">
			May 2, 2024, 5:30 p.m. ET		</time>
		
	
														</div><!-- .entry-meta -->
					</div><!-- .entry-header -->

					<div class="entry-content">
						The third season takes place a year after Deborah fired Ava after the special they worked on was released.					</div><!-- .entry-content -->
				</li><!-- #post -->

													</div>
					
					<div class="entry-header">
						
	<a class="story__flag" href="https://decider.com/stream-it-or-skip-it/">Stream It Or Skip It</a>
						<h3 class="entry-heading">
							<a href="https://decider.com/2024/05/02/turtles-all-the-way-down-hbo-max-review/" class="postid-1702852"
																>
								Stream It Or Skip It: Turtles All the Way Down on Max, Where Isabela Merced Elevates a John Green YA Adaptation</a>
						</h3>

												<div class="entry-meta">
																	<span class="story__meta__author">
		<span>By</span> John Serba	</span>
	
	<span class="bullet">&bull;</span>

				<time class="story__meta__time" datetime="2024-05-02T17:00:00+00:00">
			May 2, 2024, 5:00 p.m. ET		</time>
		
	
														</div><!-- .entry-meta -->
					</div><!-- .entry-header -->

					<div class="entry-content">
						Heavy emotions meet heavy product placement.					</div><!-- .entry-content -->
				</li><!-- #post -->

					<div class="entry-header">
						
						<h3 class="entry-heading">
							<a href="https://decider.com/2024/05/02/is-johnny-depps-jeanne-du-barry-streaming-netflix-hbo-max/" class="postid-1704331"
																>
								Is Johnny Depp's 'Jeanne Du Barry' Streaming On Netflix Or HBO Max?</a>
						</h3>

												<div class="entry-meta">
																	<span class="story__meta__author">
		<span>By</span> Samantha Nungesser	</span>
	
	<span class="bullet">&bull;</span>

				<time class="story__meta__time" datetime="2024-05-02T16:30:00+00:00">
			May 2, 2024, 4:30 p.m. ET		</time>
		
	
														</div><!-- .entry-meta -->
					</div><!-- .entry-header -->

					<div class="entry-content">
						<em>Jeanne du Barry</em>marks Depp's first big-screen appearance since his infamous defamation trial.					</div><!-- .entry-content -->
				</li><!-- #post -->

													</div>
					
					<div class="entry-header">
						
	<a class="story__flag" href="https://decider.com/stream-it-or-skip-it/">Stream It Or Skip It</a>
						<h3 class="entry-heading">
							<a href="https://decider.com/2024/05/02/a-man-in-full-netflix-review/" class="postid-1705342"
																>
								Stream It Or Skip It: 'A Man In Full' On Netflix, Where Jeff Daniels Is An Atlanta Real Estate Magnate Who Loses Everything And Cunningly Rebuilds</a>
						</h3>

												<div class="entry-meta">
																	<span class="story__meta__author">
		<span>By</span> Joel Keller	</span>
	
	<span class="bullet">&bull;</span>

				<time class="story__meta__time" datetime="2024-05-02T16:00:00+00:00">
			May 2, 2024, 4:00 p.m. ET		</time>
		
	
														</div><!-- .entry-meta -->
					</div><!-- .entry-header -->

					<div class="entry-content">
						Written by David E. Kelley based on Tom Wolfe's novel, the series also stars Diane Lane, Lucy Liu, Tom Pelphrey, Aml Ameen and William Jackson Harper.					</div><!-- .entry-content -->
				</li><!-- #post -->

						<h3 class="entry-heading">
							<a href="https://decider.com/2024/05/02/mrs-doubtfire-siblings-mara-wilson-matthew-lawrence-lisa-jakub-reunite-30-years-later/" class="postid-1705765"
																>
								'Mrs. Doubtfire' "Siblings" Mara Wilson, Matthew Lawrence And Lisa Jakub Reunite 30 Years Later: "It's Always A Joy"</a>
						</h3>

												<div class="entry-meta">
																	<span class="story__meta__author">
		<span>By</span> Radhamely De Leon	</span>
	
	<span class="bullet">&bull;</span>

				<time class="story__meta__time" datetime="2024-05-02T15:39:20+00:00">
			May 2, 2024, 3:39 p.m. ET		</time>
		
	
														</div><!-- .entry-meta -->
					</div><!-- .entry-header -->

					<div class="entry-content">
						The former child actors appear to have reunited for an upcoming podcast episode about<em>Mrs. Doubtfire</em>.					</div><!-- .entry-content -->

							<svg viewBox="15 15 70 70"><title>Facebook</title><g><path d="M61.23,28.1v8.45h-.46c-1.36,0-2.72,0-4.09,0a7.29,7.29,0,0,0-1.58.22,1.86,1.86,0,0,0-1.44,1.63,7.69,7.69,0,0,0-.1,1.17c0,1.43,0,2.86,0,4.3,0,.39.12.46.48.46,2.23,0,4.46,0,6.7,0h.56l-.9,8.47H53.56v.5q0,11.86,0,23.71c0,.62,0,.62-.6.62-3,0-6,0-9.06,0-.44,0-.54-.13-.54-.55q0-11.69,0-23.38c0-.29,0-.58,0-.91H38.29V44.34h5.09c0-.31,0-.59,0-.86,0-2,0-4,.07-6a11.38,11.38,0,0,1,1.12-4.63,8.06,8.06,0,0,1,6.13-4.43,23.34,23.34,0,0,1,3.72-.35c2.13-.06,4.27,0,6.4,0Z"></path></g></svg>

	<a
		href="https://vip.wordpress.com/?utm_source=vip_powered_wpcom&#038;utm_medium=web&#038;utm_campaign=VIP%20Footer%20Credit"

		<img
			loading="lazy"
			src="https://nypost.com/wp-content/mu-plugins/vip-helpers/images/vip-powered-dark-small.png"
			width="187"
			height="26"
			alt="Powered by WordPress.com VIP"

</footer>

		<script  type="text/plain"  class="optanon-category-C0024">
			window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
			dataLayer.push({'scrollTrackingEnabled':1} );
		</script>
				<script type="text/javascript">
			var dimension21 = 'yes';
		</script>
				<script  type="text/plain"  class="optanon-category-C0024">
		  window.ga4Dims = window.ga4Dims || {};
		  if ( typeof nypost_screen !== 'undefined' ) {
				ga('set', 'dimension8', nypost_screen);
				window.ga4Dims.screen = nypost_screen;
		  }
			ga('set', 'dimension1', 'home');
ga('set', 'dimension4', 'decider');
ga('set', 'dimension40', 'no');
ga('set', 'dimension44', 'no');
ga('set', 'dimension76', 'In-line');
			ga('set', 'dimension21', dimension21);
			window.ga4Dims.ad_blocker = dimension21;

		  // News Connect Global Identifier
			var ncgGetCookie = function( name ) {
				var regexp = new RegExp( '(?:^' + name + '|;*' + name + ')=(.*?)(?:;|$)', 'g' ),
					result = regexp.exec( document.cookie );

				return ( null === result ) ? null : result[1];
			}

			var ncgId = ncgGetCookie( '_ncg_id_' );
			if ( null !== ncgId ) {
				ga( 'set', 'dimension32', ncgId );
				window.ga4Dims.ncg_id = ncgId;
			}

			var ncgSpId = ncgGetCookie( '_ncg_sp_id\.[^=]*' );
			if ( null !== ncgSpId ) {
				ga( 'set', 'dimension51', ncgSpId );
				window.ga4Dims.ncg_sp_id = ncgSpId;
			}

			var gaAutId = ncgGetCookie( '_autid' );
			if ( null !== gaAutId ) {
				ga( 'set', 'dimension82', gaAutId );
				window.ga4Dims.ga_aut_id = gaAutId;
			}

			// Get Amazon links.
			var hasAmazon = "false";
			var links = document.links;
			var amazonLinks = [];
			for (var i = 0; links.length > i; i++) {
				if (
					links[i].href.indexOf('amazon.com') > 0
					&& !links[i].classList.contains('buy-button')
				) {
					var gaEventData = '';
					var amazonGaEvent = JSON.stringify({
						category: 'affiliate ecommerce click',
						action: 'amazon',
						label: links[i].href
					});
					  var amazonGa4Event = JSON.stringify({
						event_name: 'ux_engagement',
						source_unit: 'amazon',
						source_position: i + 1
					});

					if (links[i].dataset.gaEvent) {
						var currentGaEvent = links[i].dataset.gaEvent;
						if (Array.isArray(currentGaEvent)) {
							currentGaEvent.push(amazonGaEvent);
							gaEventData = currentGaEvent;
						} else {
							gaEventData = '['+currentGaEvent+','+amazonGaEvent+']';
						}
					} else {
						gaEventData = amazonGaEvent;
					}
				  if (links[i].dataset.ga4Event) {
						var currentGa4Event = links[i].dataset.ga4Event;
						if (Array.isArray(currentGa4Event)) {
							currentGa4Event.push(amazonGa4Event);
							ga4EventData = currentGa4Event;
						} else {
							ga4EventData = '['+currentGa4Event+','+amazonGa4Event+']';
						}
				  } else {
						ga4EventData = amazonGa4Event;
				  }

											links[i].setAttribute(
							'data-ga-event',
							gaEventData
						);
						links[i].setAttribute(
							'data-ga4-event',
							ga4EventData
						);
					
					amazonLinks.push(links[i].href);
					hasAmazon = "amazon";
				}
			}
			ga('set', 'dimension46', hasAmazon);
			window.ga4Dims.contains_commerce_link = hasAmazon;

		  if (amazonLinks.length > 0) {
				ga('set', 'dimension47', amazonLinks.join());
				window.ga4Dims.commerce_links = amazonLinks.join();
			}
			ga('require', 'linkid', 'linkid.js');
			ga('require', 'displayfeatures');
			ga('set', "contentGroup1", "home");
ga('set', "contentGroup2", "decider");
ga('set', "contentGroup3", "decider.com");

							ga('send', 'pageview');
					</script>
				<script type="text/javascript">
			// Send an event on clicks for link elements with data-nyp-affiliate="true", wait until the document has loaded.
			document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
				const affiliateLinks = document.querySelectorAll('a[data-nyp-affiliate="true"]');
				// Return early if we don't have any links.
				if ( ! affiliateLinks ) {
					return;
				}
				// Loop through the links and add the event listener.
				affiliateLinks.forEach(function(link) {
					link.addEventListener('click', function(event) {

						const {
							nypScripts: {
								nypost_wp_vars: {
									nypostSite: siteId = '',
								} = {},
							} = {},
						} = window;

						// Check if we are on the element with the a[data-nyp-affiliate="true"].
						let link = event.target;
						if ( 'true' !== link.dataset.nypAffiliate ) {
							// If not, get the closest one then get the href from that.
							link = event.target.closest('a[data-nyp-affiliate="true"]');
						}

						// Get the URL from the link.
						let href = link.href || '';

						// Bail if we don't have a href.
						if ( ! href ) {
							return;
						}

						// If the URL does not have the protocol we need to add it or URL() will throw an error.
						if (!href.startsWith('http://') && !href.startsWith('https://')) {
							href = 'https://' + href;
						}

						// Get the URL from the link.
						if (href.match(new RegExp(`https?://go.${siteId}.com/`))) {
							// Extract the URL from the skimlinks href.
							href = new URL(href).searchParams.get('url') || href;
						}

						// Ensure Trackonomics links "clicks.trx-hub.com" send the correct data to gtag.
						if (href.includes('clicks.trx-hub.com')) {
							// assign the original url (q parameter) from the href variable
							href = decodeURIComponent(new URL(href).searchParams.get('q')) || href;
						}

						// Get the URL hostname, for example: www.amazon.com.
						const retailer = new URL(href).hostname;

						gtag('event', 'outbound', {
							'internal_source': window.location.href,
							'external_destination': href,
							'retailer': retailer,
							'post_id': "1704920",
						});
					});
				});
			});
		</script>
					<!-- Google Tag Manager -->
		<noscript><iframe src="//www.googletagmanager.com/ns.html?id=GTM-PDQMLW"
		height="0" width="0" style="display:none;visibility:hidden"></iframe></noscript>
		<script>(function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':
		new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
		j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src=
		'//www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl;j.addEventListener('load', function() {
		d.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('gtm_loaded', { bubbles: true }));});f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);
		})(window,document,'script','dataLayer',"GTM-PDQMLW");

		window.nypGoogletag = function(callback) {
			if ('object' === typeof window.googletag) {
				window.googletag.cmd.push(callback);
			} else {
				window.addEventListener('gtm_loaded', function() {
					window.googletag.cmd.push(callback);
				});
			}
		};
		</script>
		<!-- End Google Tag Manager -->

		<div id="parsely-root" style="display: none">

		</div>

		u=h==="https:"?"d1z2jf7jlzjs58.cloudfront.net"
		:"static."+p+".com";

		</script>

<script type='text/javascript' src='https://decider.com/wp-content/themes/nypost-2016/client/build/js/nyp-show-ads.js?ver=869dd293421c93317414' id='nyp-show-ads-js' defer data-wp-strategy='defer'></script>

<script>document.createElement( "picture" );</script>
<script>
	// Wrapper function to reduce frequency of function running on scroll.
	const useThrottle = (func, delay = 50) => {
		let waiting;
		return function() {
			if (waiting) {
				return;
			}

			waiting = true;
			setTimeout(() => {
				func.apply(this, arguments);
				waiting = false;
			}, delay);
		}
	};

	/**
	 * Static variables and elements.
	 */
	const isDesktop = window.matchMedia('(min-width: 37.5625rem)').matches
	const nav = document.querySelector( 'nav.nav-desktop' );
	const adminBar = document.querySelector( '#wpadminbar' );
	const shareIconsTop = document.querySelector('.article-share-top .sharedaddy');
	const footer = document.querySelector('#article-footer');

	/**
	 * This Function is used to set the top position of the nav bar for mobile and desktop,
	 * to show/hide the logo in the nav on desktop,
	 * and to show/hide the share icons sidebar on desktop.
	 */
	const onScroll = useThrottle(() => {
		// get the position of the nav bar
		const navPosition = nav.getBoundingClientRect();

		const navOffset = !!adminBar ? adminBar.offsetHeight : 0;

		// if the nav bar is at the top of the page, show the logo, otherwise hide it
		if (navPosition.top <= navOffset) {
			nav.classList.add('show-logo');
		} else {
			nav.classList.remove('show-logo');
		}

		// check if the share icons top element is visible if it is, show the share icons sidebar and set the pointer events to all
		// if the footer top position is equal to the share icons bottom position, hide the share icons sidebar and set the pointer events to none
		if (
			shareIconsTop
			&& shareIconsSidebar
			&& footer
			&& shareIconsTop.getBoundingClientRect().bottom <= navPosition.bottom
			&& footer.getBoundingClientRect().top > shareIconsSidebar.getBoundingClientRect().bottom
		) {
			shareIconsSidebar.classList.add('show-share-icons');
		} else {
			shareIconsSidebar.classList.remove('show-share-icons');
		}
	}, 200);

	if ( isDesktop && nav ) {
		document.addEventListener( 'scroll', onScroll, { passive: true } );
	}
	</script>

	<div id="div-gpt-ad-custom" class="dfp-ad dfp-ad-decider dfp-custom" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
			<div class="ad-wrapper">
		<script  type="text/plain"  class="optanon-category-C0023">
			var adWrapper = document.querySelector('.gallery-ad__wrapper');
			if (typeof googletag !== 'undefined') {
				googletag.cmd.push(function() {
					if (window.definedSlots && -1 !== window.definedSlots.indexOf("div-gpt-ad-custom")) {
						googletag.display("div-gpt-ad-custom");
					} else {
						console.log('div-gpt-ad-custom not a defined slot', window.definedSlots || []);
					}
				});
			}
		</script>
	</div>
